attributes.action: Ban a proposed March By Islamic extremists through Wootton Bassett
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am not racist, I am Not Politically minded, But I think the procession would cause huge public disorder and give a group of hitherto unknown fanatics who are by far the minority of Muslims in this country a platform from which to launch their spread of hatred and fear.Their actions also directly insult our military personnell who have given the ultimate sacrifice.

rejection.details: Islam4UK has decided not to march through the town.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
